bibl.title: Al-Qasr: the Roman Castrum of Dakhleh Oasis.
The Oasis Papers 6. Proceedings of the Sixth International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project

bibl.note: Introduction. - Description of the castrum and the related documentary evidence. - Late Roman fortifications in Egypt and the major oasis sites. - Notitia Dignitatum, strategy and the role of the military in the oases. - Concluding statement.
bibl.seg: Paul Kucera, Al-Qasr: the Roman Castrum of Dakhleh Oasis.

Roger S. Bagnall, Paola Davoli & Colin A. Hope (edd.), assisted by Bruce E. Parr (Production Editor), The Oasis Papers 6. Proceedings of the Sixth International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 15 (Oxford, 2012) pp. 305-316, 5 figg.

Introduction. - Description of the castrum and the related documentary evidence. - Late Roman fortifications in Egypt and the major oasis sites. - Notitia Dignitatum, strategy and the role of the military in the oases. - Concluding statement.
